  25 
  26 import requests
  27 
  28 from .exceptions import HTTPError
  29 from .package import json2package
  30 
  31 
  32 def get(package_name, pypi_server="https://pypi.python.org/pypi/"):
  33     """
  34     Constructs a request to the PyPI server and returns a
  35     :class:`yarg.package.Package`.
  36 
  37     :param package_name: case sensitive name of the package on the PyPI server.
  38     :param pypi_server: (option) URL to the PyPI server.
  39 
  40         >>> import yarg
  41         >>> package = yarg.get('yarg')
  42         <Package yarg>
  43     """
  44     if not pypi_server.endswith("/"):
  45         pypi_server = pypi_server + "/"
  46     response = requests.get("{0}{1}/json".format(pypi_server,
  47                                                  package_name))
  48     if response.status_code >= 300:
  49         raise HTTPError(status_code=response.status_code,
  50                         reason=response.reason)
  51     if hasattr(response.content, 'decode'):
  52         return json2package(response.content.decode())
  53     else:
  54         return json2package(response.content)
